warn_owners_of_impending_bill

warn_owners_of_impending_bill.Rmd

warn_owners_of_impending_bill sends an email to project owners who have projects scheduled to be invoiced in the next month. It reminds the owner of the impending bill and the amount of the charge. The email provides guidance about deleting projects and reassigning ownership. It provides links to instructions for each of these tasks. The email describes the sequestration process that ensues when an invoice is unpaid after 90 days.

warn_owners_of_impending_bill data processing workflow

Developed by Philip Chase, Laurence James-Woodley, Kyle Chesney, Michael Bentz, Sai Pavan Kamma.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
